Faye: Marketta, I'm delighted to hear about your progress and eagerness to explore platforms for connecting with like-minded creators. I can recommend a few online communities and forums focused on cultural preservation, sustainable design, and artisanal crafts.

Some platforms to consider are:
- Craft Community (https://craftcommunity.com/): A space for artists, makers, and designers to share their work, connect with peers, and discover resources.
- Etsy Forum (https://www.etsy.com/teams): Etsy's team forums provide an excellent opportunity to connect with fellow creators, discuss challenges, and exchange ideas.
- Slow Design Movement (https://www.slowmovement.com/): This community fosters connections between designers who prioritize sustainability, cultural heritage, and long-term value.

Additionally, platforms like Instagram and Pinterest can be excellent resources for finding and connecting with creators who share similar values. Search for hashtags such as #culturalpreservation, #slowdesign, and #sustainabledesign to discover profiles and begin networking.
